column2: The APB_PLL module instantiates the PLL and control registers to set the operation conditions of the PLL. It also controls 4 final divisors to generate the Soc Clock, the Peripheral Clock, The FPGA clock and the reference clock for the timer blocks
and configuring selected I/O to generate interrupts.
Any GPIO can be configured for level type interrupts or edge triggered interrupts.

column7: Feedback Divider Control Pins. Set the feedback divider factor from 16 to 2047
Output Divider Control Pins. Set the post divider factor from 1 to 7
